title: Log a Fault Code from a Machine
description: A machine has thrown a fault code. A technician needs to log this code in the maintenance ticket to aid in diagnosis.

tasks.description: Retrieve the open maintenance ticket for the faulted machine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct work order.

tasks.description: Enter the fault code displayed on the machine's HMI into the work order log.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the fault code in the ticket.

tasks.description: Use the fault code to look up potential causes in the knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent searches the knowledge base with the code and finds articles related to sensor failures.
